values.name: Inspector
values.description: Reserved and practical, they tend to be loyal, orderly, and traditional.

values.name: Crafter
values.description: Highly independent, they enjoy new experiences that provide first-hand learning.

values.name: Protector
values.description: Warm-hearted and dedicated, they are always ready to protect the people they care about.

values.name: Artist
values.description: Easy-going and flexible, they tend to be reserved and artistic.

values.name: Advocate
values.description: Creative and analytical, they are one of the rarest types.

values.name: Mediator
values.description: Idealistic with high values, they strive to make the world a better place.

values.name: Architect
values.description: High logical, they are both very creative and analytical.

values.name: Thinker
values.description: Quiet and introverted, they are known for having a rich inner world.

values.name: Persuader
values.description: Out-going and dramatic, they enjoy spending time with others and focusing on the here-and-now.

values.name: Director
values.description: Assertive and rule-oriented, they have high principles and a tendency to take charge.

values.name: Performer
values.description: Outgoing and spontaneous, they enjoy taking center stage.

values.name: Caregiver
values.description: Soft-hearted and outgoing, they tend to believe the best about other people.

values.name: Champion
values.description: Charismatic and energetic, they enjoy situations where they can put their creativity to work.

values.name: Giver
values.description: Loyal and sensitive, they are known for being understanding and generous.

values.name: Debater
values.description: Highly inventive, they love being surrounded by ideas and tend to start many projects, but may struggle to finish them.

values.name: Commander
values.description: Outspoken and confident, they are great at making plans and organizing projects.
